channel.title: Ink on Adam Israel
channel.description: Recent content in Ink on Adam Israel

item.title: Reason #634 why Kyle Cassidy is awesome
item.description: Not only is Kyle Cassidy a heck of a photographer, writer and teacher, he is also one hell of a nice guy. I had a lucky chance to meet and learn a few photography skills some months back. He learned that I was also a writer and offered to send me one of his extra fountain pens. I very nearly squeed. I’ve been interested in fountain pens for as long as I can remember.
